    This is the main class of the model, it represents the game and connects all the subclasses.
  • Classes in it.polimi.softeng.model used by it.polimi.softeng.model
    Class
    Description
    Badge
    The interface Badge is used to collect BadgeEndGame(Singleton) and BadgeScore(enum).
    BadgeEndGame
    We use Singleton pattern (Eager Singleton), because BadgeEndGame has only one instance.
    BadgeScore
    BadgeScore enumeration defines four different types of BadgeScore with their corresponding scores (2, 4, 6, 8).
    Cell
    This class represents the cell in the Shelfie.
    GameBoard
    Model representation of GameBoard
    PersonalCards
    This class represents Personal Achievement of the cards.
    PersonalCards.ObjectiveCell
    This class represents a specific colored cell (row, column) of the shelfie, that composes the PersonalCard.
    Player
    This class is the model representation of player.
    Shelfie
    This class is the representation of shelfie.
    Tile
    This class represents the tiles used in game.
    Tile.TileColor
